description.narrative: The People to People Links program involves several initiatives that aim to partner Australian and Pacific people and institutions to support strong links and build capacity in Pacific Island countries. Current initiatives under this investment include partnerships to build capacity in the fields of education, research, cultural heritage and leadership. Objectives of these programs include: supporting strong partnerships and dialogue on matters of mutual interest; improving intercultural knowledge and skills of all participants; improving ICT knowledge and skills; building professional knowledge and skills; improving leadership practices; and supporting Pacific research and access to cultural heritage. The total value of this investment, which commenced in September 2017, is $21.8 million over four years.
